instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook Pro Mid 2010 running slow
threads.message: Hi, i had a dead Mac Pro mid 2010 and replaced <CHIP>U9000</CHIP>, after which it came back to life. Now there seems another issue, the macbook is running slow, Everything is slow, installing new OS, even on an SSD. Tried to run a Apple HWT but that gets stuck 1 minute into the test when testing memory. Changed a few different modules, ones known to work well, but still the same. Any idea what could cause this?

threads.title: Macbook Pro Mid 2010 running slow
threads.message: Are you using PC3-8500 RAM modules???
